name: Shake Shack Upper East Side
address: 154 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

reviews.text:
I placed a mobile pickup order around 4:51 PM and then went shopping next door. I arrived at the Upper East Side location around 6:11 PM, but my order was not ready. The female staff member at the pickup station was friendly and promptly notified the kitchen, but what happened afterward was concerning.

A tall male staff member â€” who appeared to be in a managerial role â€” approached me and said they would only remake my order if I left a positive review. He also claimed that Shake Shack discards mobile orders if not picked up within a certain time window, which contradicts my past experience. When I declined to write a review on the spot, he took photos of my order confirmation and went to check the system. He later returned, said my order had never appeared, and manually entered it. I finally received my food around 6:30 PM.

I usually receive a text notification when my order is ready, which did not happen this time. Technical issues can occur, but it is inappropriate for any staff member to pressure a customer for a positive review â€” especially when the order was missing in the first place. Thatâ€™s why Iâ€™m here leaving this review.
De trÃ¨s bons smash burgers ğŸ” dans cette chaine de restauration rapide

C'est pas mauvais pour de la malbouffe.
Petit coin public accolÃ© trÃ¨s pratique pour manger
Les meilleurs burger des Etats Unis, a quand l'ouverture en France
Bien, bon burger
You have 15 people working in the kitchen, and my food took like 25 min to be served, in the past has hair on my fries ğŸ˜â€¦

Food was okay. They got my order wrong TWICE. First time they gave me two completely different burgers then when I told them about it they threw them out in front of me and made new burgers but still got it wrong because I asked for no bacon and they put bacon.
Tutto molto buono
Nice
Very good better than I remember!  Clean and friendly
One of the best burgers in my life! 5 stars!

Shake Shack is my favorite burger spot in New York. Everything tastes fresh and delicious, from the burgers to the fries, and the service is consistently good. A great place to enjoy a quality meal every time.
I liked the place and the food
Las mejores hamburguesas de New Yok
Burger and fries always a hit
Fast food avec peu de choix et des burgers assez petit, mais trÃ¨s trÃ¨s bons. Attente un peu longue, mais Ã§a valait le coup !
Buonissimo

I would have enjoyed the avocado bacon burger more if the avocado was sliced instead of a chunk between the roll. Two of my friends had the same burger, one had sliced avocado and the other was a chunk like mine. Wouldn't make sense to just have some pre-sliced?

Pretty busy, but they are reasonably fast during the dinner rush. Seating in the front as well as rear of restaurant. Addition, there's an outdoor area for seating as well. The restaurant is located in the "basement" as it requires one to walk down a flight of stairs. Those that require ADA accommodation may have trouble getting down to the restaurant.

Both lack of customer service and incompetence of employees steering me away.  If you're picking up order from this location, always remember to check the content, open the box to see the items match what you ordered.  I ordered Buy 1 + 1 burger. with fries but had some hiccup at ordering on UberEat. Manager was kind enough to help rectify the issue during my pick-up; the employees were busy chit-chatting with each other and handed me wrong items. Due to packaging, I couldn't tell and didn't suspect anything until I got home and realized instead of the +1 burger, I was handed small fries and another order of fries in a square burger box. When I went back to the store , the employees there was non-apologetic and told me if I wanted to cancel/return the order, he could do that. While I understand mistakes do happen during rush hours, error here was clearly caused by employee inattentiveness at work.  Instead of acknowledging mistake and apologize,  I the customer was made to feel I was the one at fault. Happy to take my business elsewhere and vote with my dollar.  If there's negative star/rating for customer service, that's what this location deserves.
Nahh
Nice and huge restaurant with only 2 smalls bathrooms..
Ordering here is impossible. Itâ€™s so so slow because people canâ€™t use the self service. Awful.

Lo mejor las patatas, las hamburguesas como las del McDonald's.
Muy bien atendidos y buenos precios
Good, affordable burger, made fast.

I listed my name and my number for a pretty basic order. When the server brought me my food, he told me in a very catty tone that they'd been calling my name inside. Except he wasn't calling my name, because it's Cassie, not Sisi. Also, I had a number they could've used. And they forgot my ranch. Don't need much from this place, but it's really not my fault if you can't read a name right.
Best burgers in New York
Shack Shack Burger has a thick patty. The chocolate shake is delicious.
Muy ricas las hamburguesa
TrÃ¨s bon mais TrÃ¨s cher pour un fast foods
Thank you for always having my online pick up order ready. There is extra seating outside if the restaurant is too crowded.

They have Dubai chocolate shakes which are amazing. The food of course is always consistent and love the delivery to table service. Pricy but worth it because of the staff, environment, and experience.

Normally pretty good but today they were just terrible- waited 20 mins for my pickup order and then when I asked they gave me attitude. Everyone just standing around in the back. Go to McDonalds at this point lol

Canâ€™t say enough good about here. Itâ€™s Sunday 7/12 in the afternoon- this staff is exceptional in every way. Their smiling is infectious and the food is outstanding. Best damn burger Iâ€™ve had in a while, real perfection of a classic burger. Those cooks on the grill are phenomenal. Well done this team should be celebrated, they all take this seriously and clearly strive for perfection. Raises/bonuses are in order! Will be back asap.

Lovely place with great staff!
I tried their â€˜Shroom Burger and Mango Lemonadeâ€”both were delicious. The burger had fresh buns, a juicy, cheesy patty, and overall amazing flavor. I was really impressed by the quality of their vegetarian options, which makes me curious how good the non-veg must be! The Mango Lemonade was refreshingâ€”slightly on the sour side, but still enjoyable. Definitely recommend giving this place a try at least once!
Nothing like a burger and shake after 20k step day

Situato nella zona est di Central Park, Ã¨ comodo andarci magari dopo la visita al Met o al Guggenheim Museum. Se siete amanti dei fast food Ã¨ super consigliato,e questa sede credo sia il migliore di tutta New York (considerando che ce ne sono molte nella grande mela).
Il panino Ã¨ succoso e non Ã¨ piccolo come gli altri fast food, le patatine sono fresche e crottanti ma la cosa piÃº buona sono i MilkShakeâ€¦ quello al gusto Oreo Ã¨ devastante!!!
La pulizia del locale Ã¨ buona, il servizio Ã¨ nella media anche se siamo andati alle 15.30 circa quindi non in momento di caos. I bagni sono abbastanza puliti e muniti di carta igienica e sapone per lavare le mani.
Molto consigliato.
Limited seating inside.  More outside, under shade.  I like that they have staff that monitor for non customers trying to sit on limited inside tables and kindly ask them to leave.

I absolutely love this place. It's great for a quick bite with a few dietary options for vegetarians or desserts. I ordered ahead for pickup and ended up dining up. The tables are clean and the service is quick.
ğŸ¤¤
Nice staffs

Toujours d'aussi bons burgers
A essayer sans mesure

Visita obligada si voy a US, no puedo no ir a disfrutar una rica hamburguesa de SS!
De otro planeta la Avocado Bacon Burger, la combinaciÃ³n de la palta y el bacon crocante es un placer para el paladar. Las papas fritas
Al lugar se accede por escaleras hacia abajo.
La atenciÃ³n bastante Ã¡gil aÃºn con mucha gente.

I got the seasonal truffle burger and a smoke shack with French fries and a peach and cream shake. Everything was very good. I enjoyed the burgers, the patty was nice and juicy. They also have a generous amount of cheese. It definitely passed my string test. The flavor was nice. I also really enjoyed their shake. It got real peach chunks in it and that was just wonderful. I also didnâ€™t know that they had people bringing the food in a tray to you in the restaurant, and that was very nice.

Edit 1, I tried the â€˜Shroom and the black truffleâ€™Shroom burgers for the first time, and both were delicious!!

We had an amazing experience at Shake Shack! The place has plenty of seating, the environment is super clean, and the staff are incredibly attentive and quick with everything. Everyone was so friendly, which made the experience even better.

We ordered a mix of things â€” a chicken burger, a regular burger, fries, a milkshake, and their lemonade sweet tea combo â€” and everything was absolutely delicious. The fries were especially great, and the condiment station was well-stocked and spotless. The overall vibe was just friendly and welcoming.

One tip: if you need to use the washroom, make sure to keep your receipt. Overall, this Shake Shack gets a solid 5 stars for great food and fantastic service!

Shake shack serves a solid smash burger. The smoke shack and the shack burger are both good choices. If youâ€™re looking for more flavor, get the smoke shack. Otherwise, the shack burger is your classic BLT cheeseburger. The cookies n cream shake is delicious! Fries are average. This location has tons of seating, both indoor and outdoor. Fast service!

Un buon fastfood. Il cibo non Ã¨ male. Hamburger di medie dimensioni. QualitÃ  superiore rispetto ad altri fastfood piÃ¹ rinomati. Il servizio Ã¨ stato discreto. Il locale perÃ² pulito ed accogliente.

The burger and the milkshake were both tastyâ€”nothing extraordinary, but definitely satisfying and nothing to complain about. The flavors were simple yet enjoyable. The store itself was also spacious and clean, providing a comfortable environment to eat in. Overall, it was a solid experience, and I would happily visit again for a casual meal.
Hands down one of the best chicken burgers ever. You taste quality food despite the small size and big price. Fries are real potatoes, super yummy. Staff are friendly. Very crowded in the evenings.

Perfect place for a hot cheeseburger and chicken sandwich. Friendly staff and fast service makes Shake Shack an amazing place to grab a quick bite. Smash burgers were flavorful and piping hot with melty cheese. The chicken sandwich was also blistering hot in a good way and the sauce and pickles were the best combination for this sandwich. There's some seating indoors and a bit of an outdoor area for seating as well. Hot cheeseburgers in the winter never tasted better!
The SmashBurger was so good! La carne era veramente tenera e il ragazzo che ci ha preso lâ€™ordine molto gentile. Posto carino con da sedere fuori.

Really good burger, we had double truffle and it was really good 8/10
staff was very polite and kind. def recommend. fries could be better but they are okay.

Necesitan probarlas. Si vienen a Nueva York y quieren una hamburguesa emblemÃ¡tica, aquÃ­ la tienen.

Personalmente recomiendo la Smoke Shack. Si comen mucho, pÃ­danla ya sea con papas o con doble carne y una bebida. Una sola hamburguesa no te va a satisfacer.

Pero el sabor es perfecto. Vale cada dÃ³lar.
